full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL GSANG BA'I BDAG PO PHYAG NA RDO RJE'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (SMRAS PA, MTHU STOBS DBANG PHYUG GSANG BA'I BDAG PO YI, ,SGO NAS NAD GDON DGRA BGEGS BAR CHOD RNAMS @008A *, ,BZLOG CING BSGYUR BA'I CHO GA 'DI LTAR BU'I, ,THU SHI YE GUNG KUN DGA' DON LDAN ZHES, ,BYA BA MNGA' 'BANGS DGE SLONG BLO GROS DANG, ,BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS GNYIS KA NAN TAN GYIS, ,YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGO BSRUNG DE'I SLAD DU, ,GZHAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR CHO GA RIGS 'GRO NAS, ,BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN SUG BRIS LA, ,LHAG CHAD NOR 'KHRUL SOGS NYES CI MCHIS KUN, ,BLA MA LHA TSOGS BZOD CING BYAMS PAR MDZOD, ,GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DES, ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN DANG BSTAN 'DZIN DAR ZHING RGYAS, ,MA GYUR 'GRO KUN BAR GCOD KUN SEL ZHING, ,TSE RABS KUN TU BLA MA'I RJES BZUNG STE, ,KUN MKHYEN GO 'PHANG THOB PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO, ,ZHES PA 'DI NI THU SHI YE GUNG KUN DGA' DON LDAN ZHES BYA'I 'BANGS, ,DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BLO GROS PI LIG THU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS GNYIS KA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES, ,YANG YANG NAN TAN CHEN POS 'BANGS, ,DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BLO GROS PI LIG THU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS GNYIS KA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES, ,YANG YANG NAN TAN CHEN POS @008B BSKUL BA'I NGO BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU, ,BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I, ,SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, ,BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, DGE BSGOS BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO BA'O,, ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
